DLCRITFUMBLE.ModuleName: Dorman Lakely's Critical Hit & Fumble Tables
DLCRITFUMBLE.ModuleDescription: Tier-based critical hit and fumble tables for D&D 5e

EnableCrits.Name: Enable Critical Hit Tables
EnableCrits.Hint: Automatically roll on critical hit table when rolling a natural 20

EnableFumbles.Name: Enable Fumble Tables
EnableFumbles.Hint: Automatically roll on fumble table when rolling a natural 1

ApplyEffects.Name: Apply Effects Automatically
ApplyEffects.Hint: Automatically apply damage and conditions from crit/fumble results

UseActorLevel.Name: Use Actor Level for Tier
UseActorLevel.Hint: Automatically determine tier based on the attacking actor's level

FixedTier.Name: Fixed Tier Selection
FixedTier.Hint: When not using actor level, use this tier for all rolls

CritSound.Name: Critical Hit Sound
CritSound.Hint: Sound effect to play when a critical hit occurs. Leave empty for no sound.

FumbleSound.Name: Fumble Sound
FumbleSound.Hint: Sound effect to play when a fumble occurs. Leave empty for no sound.

ReimportTables.Name: Re-import Tables
ReimportTables.Label: Re-import Tables
ReimportTables.Hint: Delete and re-import all crit/fumble tables from the module source. Use this if tables are missing or corrupted.
ReimportTables.DialogMessage: This will delete all existing crit/fumble tables and re-import them from the module source.
ReimportTables.ConfirmMessage: This will delete ALL existing crit/fumble tables and re-import fresh copies from the module.
ReimportTables.Warning: Warning: Any custom table modifications will be lost!

ResetSettings.Name: Reset to Defaults
ResetSettings.Label: Reset Settings
ResetSettings.Hint: Reset all module settings to their default values.
ResetSettings.ConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to their default values?

Patreon.Name: Support on Patreon
Patreon.Label: Visit Patreon
Patreon.Hint: Support the development of this module on Patreon! Your contributions help fund new features and updates.

Chat.NothingSpecialDesc: Your critical strike deals damage as normal, but no additional effect occurs.
Chat.NothingSpecialFumbleDesc: You fumble, but recover quickly with no additional penalty.

UpdateTables.Title: Update Crit/Fumble Tables
UpdateTables.Content: A new version of the crit/fumble tables is available! Your tables were imported from version {oldVersion}, and version {newVersion} is now available with new effects and improvements.
UpdateTables.Warning: Note: Updating will replace your current tables. Any custom modifications will be lost.

Errors.MidiQolRequired: Dorman Lakely's Critical Hit & Fumble Tables requires Midi-QOL to be enabled.
Errors.TableNotFound: Table '{tableName}' not found. Please import the compendium tables.
Errors.NoTargetToken: No target token found for effect application.

Notifications.ModuleReady: Dorman Lakely's Critical Hit & Fumble Tables is ready!
Notifications.UpdateSkipped: Table update skipped. You can update later via Module Settings > Re-import Tables.
